des: "An easy fluffy lemon no-bake pie. The filling is made by folding lemon, gelatin and whipped topping together."
ins: In a small microwave safe bowl, combine water and gelatin. Microwave for 1 minute. Stir in the lemon juice. Fold in 1/3 of the whipped topping to lighten, then fold in the remaining whipped topping until no streaks remain. Pour into baked pie shell. Chill in refrigerator until ready to serve.
